model

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Store
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, SLoginModel, SOfferModel, SProductModel, SReviewModel, SSalesModel, StoreModel, StoreModelClientHandler

    public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, StoreModel
    Store is an implementation of StoreModel, the interface of systems model. This class handles adding, removal, editing, getting of different values of sales, reviews, usernames, passwords, as well as managing the connection and data sharing between view and networking part of the system.
    Version:
    (Version 1.0, 06/04/2019)
    Author:
    Group 1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
